name: Amalgamation
immunities: fire, poison, psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren’t adamantine
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can’t speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The amalgamation is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Item Use
traits.desc: The amalgamation can use any of the items contained within its bulk. Items with limited uses, such as potions, scrolls, or wands, are expended normally.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The amalgamation has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The amalgamation’s weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Swarm Attack
traits.desc: The amalgamation can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa, damaging the creature with the flying weapons and objects composing its bulk. Any creature that starts their turn in the same space as the amalgamation must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 21 (6d6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The amalgamation makes four melee attacks.

actions.name: Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
